Heading: Proprietary
Note: A short explanatory label for the sequence should be provided in <CollectionSequenceTypeName>

Heading: Title order
Note: Order as specified by the title, eg by volume or part number sequence, provided for confirmation

Heading: Publication order
Note: Order of publication of products within the collection

Heading: Temporal/narrative order
Note: Order defined by a continuing narrative or temporal sequence within products in the collection. Applicable to either fiction or to non-fiction (eg within a collection of history textbooks)

Heading: Original publication order
Note: Original publication order, for a republished collection or collected works originally published outside a collection

Heading: Suggested reading order
Note: Where it is different from the title order, publication order, narrative order etc

Heading: Suggested display order
Note: Where it is different from the title order, publication order, narrative order, reading order etc
